list_definition.definition: a tool like a spade, with a short handle, used for scooping up and moving coal, gravel etc
to move (as if) with a shovel, especially in large quantities

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He shovelled snow from the path
Don’t shovel your food into your mouth!

All that was shovelled through in the course of half-a-day and a night.
